definition: A term used to describe the connection or link between two entities, typically referring to the physical or logistical connection between different locations, systems, or modes of transportation. It is commonly used in the context of infrastructure, transportation networks, or technological integration.

examples.german: Die Anbindung an das Ã¶ffentliche Verkehrsnetz ist sehr gut.
examples.english: The connection to the public transportation network is very good.

examples.german: Das Hotel hat eine direkte Anbindung zum Flughafen.
examples.english: The hotel has a direct connection to the airport.

examples.german: Die Anbindung der neuen Software an das bestehende System war kompliziert.
examples.english: The integration of the new software into the existing system was complicated.

examples.german: Die Anbindung des Hauses an das Stromnetz wurde verbessert.
examples.english: The connection of the house to the power grid has been improved.

examples.german: Die Anbindung der Stadt an das Autobahnnetz ist sehr gut.
examples.english: The city has a very good connection to the highway network.
